channel.title: Left Join on Tim Trice
channel.description: Recent content in Left Join on Tim Trice

item.title: Combine Two Tables
item.description: Join two tables in a SQL database to create one table. USE `employees`; Table A (employees) has a PRIMARY KEY emp_no. EXPLAIN `employees`; Table 1: 6 records Field Type Null Key Default Extra emp_no int(11) NO PRI NA birth_date date NO NA first_name varchar(14) NO NA last_name varchar(16) NO NA gender enum(‘M’,‘F’) NO NA hire_date date NO NA Table B (titles) also has a PRIMARY KEY emp_no.
